A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Very good movie! Apart from a number of mistakes which may have ruined/degraded the viewing experience of some cinema goers. For example\, Leia randomly flying back into the ship wish bizarre and unnecessary\, general ackbar (an already known and loved  character) could have played a better 'second in command' and received a worthy death\, there were no light saber fights\, the Kylo Ren storyline was extremely predictable and too similar to the last movie\, many also found Rose's character to be extremely underwhelming\, captain phantasm got nerfed once again\, Snoke got nerfed and we still know nothing about him ETC. All in all a decent flick\, but a star wars movie could be so much better!
